message: I propose dividing the money in a 70-30 ratio. This might seem like a generous offer considering the risk of inflation, but remember, the value of the money decreases by 10% with each round. Consider this offer carefully.

I propose a 70-30 split in my favor, reflecting the risk of inflation.  As the proposer, I'm taking the risk of having the offer rejected and losing a potential 10% of my share in the next round. Consider it carefully.
